themes: Lack of engagement by city leadership with local arts
Overemphasis on commercial and mainstream art
Need for curiosity and active participation from decision-makers
Visibility of diverse and lesser-known art events
key_phrases: Those who oversee ACME and higher ups in city goverment, such as city council and the Mayor should go out and see some art
not just what's commercial and mainstream or getting the most publicity
develop the curiousity to learn about what's out there by actually showing up
Follow Concept Animals on IG that covers all art listings and goings on every week and go to one
barriers_identified: City leadership's limited exposure to non-mainstream art
solutions_proposed: City officials should attend a wider variety of art events
Leaders should follow Concept Animals on Instagram to stay informed about local art
